scripts.pwtests: docker run --rm --network host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.35.1-jammy /bin/bash -c "npm ci; npx playwright install; npx playwright test"
scripts.pwtests-update: docker run --rm --network host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.35.1-jammy /bin/bash -c "npm ci; npx playwright install; npx playwright test --update-snapshots"
